scripts.minimize-lib-files: cd lib && find . -type f \( -name '*.js' \) | while read fn; do terser --source-map "content='$fn.map',filename='$fn.map',url='$fn.map'" $fn -o $fn; done

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test && npm run test:dist
